title: Landmine Goes Click (2015)
overview: After an American tourist steps on a landmine, he is forced to watch his girlfriend get assaulted.
storyline: Three American tourists are crossing a desolated landscape of European Georgia. One of them steps on an armed landmine. But that seems to be a minor threat compared to the nightmarish happenings that the afternoon will bring on. A psychopath takes advantage of the tourist's immobility and brutally abuses and assaults the woman he loves.
synopsis: CHRIS HAS A PROBLEM. WHILE HIKING WITH FRIENDS, HE STEPPED ON A LANDMINE AND HAS NO WAY TO GET OFF WITHOUT DETONATING IT. ON TOP OF THAT, THE SITUATION HAS FORCED HIM TO ADMIT TO HIS BEST FRIEND THAT HES HAVING AN AFFAIR WITH THE FRIENDS FIANCÉE. WHEN THE FRIEND ABANDONS THEM IN ANGER, A HUNTER AND THE DOG SHOW UP. HE TAKES ADVANTAGE OF CHRISS IMMOBILITY AND BRUTALLY RAPE AND ASSAULT THE WOMAN HE LOVES RIGHT BEFORE HIS EYES. NOW ITS CHRIS WHO TURNS TO REVENGE WHEN HE GOES AFTER THE MAN WHO DESTROYED HIS LIFE.
